name: Genetic Engineering
description:
You have a PHD in genetic engineering, and you can use this to your advantage by applying any [Gene] you collect to yourself, mobs or other players. You can only apply 1 gene at a time to other players unless their origin is Human or Human Champion. For every [Gene] you apply, the recipient will develop a [Side Effect]. The severity of the [Side Effect] varies and it is always unpredictable.
 
When used on someone other than yourself: Trigger [Injection Cooldown]. You can not inject that creature for 30 seconds.

badges.text: Tips: Some side-effects will only appear if a special gene is added!

Tips: You or the person you inject can use a stabilizer to reset both genes and side-effects.
 
Genes and side-effects reset on death.
Tips: Active genes persist after death on Geneticist, but not on other origins!
